alert.note: Alert for Gallia; Meigs (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 27 at 6:52PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Meigs, eastern Gallia, Mason, northeastern Putnam, west central Wirt, Jackson and southwestern Wood Counties through 730 PM EDT... At 652 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Mason, or near Rutland, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Point Pleasant, Gallipolis, Ripley, Pomeroy, Racine, Rutland, Forked Run State Park, Ravenswood, New Haven, Mason, Sandyville, Kenna, Middleport, Chester, Syracuse, Hartford City, Henderson, Leon, Cheshire and Portland. This includes Interstate 77 in West Virginia between mile markers 122 and 164. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
